title: HPE security advisory (AV25-663)
description: On October 13, 2025, HPE published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200  versions prior to v1.65.60
HPE Superdome Flex 280 Server - versions prior to v2.05.12
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
